comments:
I got some problems with XDebug. Perhaps this is a general problem and not referred to xdebug only. I am using a current cvs snapshot (HEAD, updated some minutes before I reported this problem) to review xdebug integration an I am trying to debug some website:

breakpoint @ "index.php"
First step into leads to "autoload_zend.php" (installed an autoload routine before)
Second step into leads to "Zend/Loader.php"

When klicking step into first time it opens a new Editor and displays the corretsource (autoload_zend.php). After clicking step into the second time eclipse reports an exception. It tried to open Zend/Loader.php but the syntax highliting is corrupt. If I open every file I want to debug manually before starting my debug session it works as expected (step into switches the active file editor). This only happens if I did not open all the files before. step into works if it does not need to open a new source file.

Expected behaviour: Within JDT it will open the new source (Tend/Loader.php) at the last editor (File autoload_zend.php will be replaced).

exception details:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.IllegalStateException: Error reading structure model in PhpValidator#validator())

If I try to click on some backtrace to open another source eclipse reports some new exceptions from wst. This might be caused in corrupt information about opned editors... It tries to close the editor of the previous file (index.php). But this file was replaced by another source (autoload_zend.php or Zend/Loader.php) and is not present any more.
